gameDetails.name: Vexation
gameDetails.description:
A large, shared network of railroad tracks develops across the continent. But it can be annoying sometimes if other players blatantly exploit your own routes. So, from time to time you need to put a stop to that.

Bundled with 2009 editions of Trans Europa and TransAmerica, and the 2019 edition of TransAmerica & Japan.

Expands:

    TransAmerica
    Trans Europa
